ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In them are sweet, lovely maidens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: In them good and comely maidens --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: In the midst of these will be maidens, good and comely.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: There will be well-disciplined, beautiful maidens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In them are women of good behaviour and gorgeous faces.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: In them are goodly things, beautiful ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Wherein (are found) the good and beautiful -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Therein will be maidens chaste and beautiful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Therein will be damsels agreeable and beauteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: In them are maidens good and lovely.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: In them will be fair (Companions), good, beautiful;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Therein (gardens) will be fair (wives) good and beautiful;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: In them shall be good and pleasing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In them are good and beautiful ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: In them are good and beautiful women -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [55:70] In them, that is, in the two gardens and their palaces and what they comprise, are maidens [who are] good, in nature [and with], beautiful, faces.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Wherein (are found) the good and beautiful) wives, i.e. good for their husbands.
